text: 512 was a leap year. == Events == * Roman (Byzantine) Emperor Anastasius I ends a period of moderate ecclestical policy, and starts strongly favoring his own monophysitist beliefs. * Flavian II, Patriarch of Antioch, is deposed and replaced with Severus. * The island nation of Usan-guk is conquered by the Korean Silla Dynasty general Lee Sabu. * Earliest known dated text in the Arabic alphabet, at Zebed in Syria == Births == * Saint David
